attributes.action: We want US to ban the movie "Innocence of Muslims"
attributes.additional_details:
In case you are not aware, an amateur movie was posted (in several parts) on YouTube (on the eve of the anniversary of 9/11) insulting our beloved Messenger, Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him). This movie is totally outrageous and utterly despicable - I have never seen anything like it in my life. Violent protests have erupted across Egypt and Libya.

As Muslims, we love all the Messengers of God - including Jesus, Moses and Noah - and we would never tolerate an attack on any one of them. But the Messenger Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) has a very special place in our hearts, and we love him more than our mothers and fathers and the whole of humanity.
